GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop: Amelie is an artist. She livesin a flat in Paris with her boyfriend, Jacques. He is a musician and heplaysin a band. Every day Amelie getsup early,makessome coffee and then goesfor a walk around the city. Shewatchespeople as they go to work and she oftendraws small pictures in her notebook. Shelikesgoing to the market and watching peoplebuyfish and vegetables. The old women stand and talk to each other, and Amelie always watches.
